txt.en:
'Ah, [placeholder], what have you learned of the demon-pits?'

You inform Neshurga of what you learned while scouting Utug-bûr.

'So there are even more of these monstrous creatures pouring from Utug-bûr. That is what I feared, and it appears we are losing the battle everywhere. Thank you for bringing this information to me.'
Scout Utug-bûr from the location that Neshurga described.
Reach the Utug-bûr scouting location that Neshurga described.
Return to Neshurga in Ub Nishir with the information you've gathered on Utug-bûr.
Arrived at the Utug-bûr scouting location
Neshurga has asked you to go investigate Utug-bûr because he needs more information on what they are up against in Urash Dâr.
Scout out Utug-bûr to gather information

'Yes? You must be the [placeholder] of which Galâmka spoke. I am Neshurga.

'I am in need of your assistance. We do not know much about our enemy that came from this Utug-bûr, this demon-pit. We have only seen these monsters when they took Maurûsh from us.

'If you would, I ask that you travel to Utug-bûr and learn what you can. Along the river are hills that you may find a good vantage point, but I suggest you keep your distance from the gates of Utug-bûr, that is more danger than it is worth.'
Return to Neshurga in Ub Nishir
